reviewtext: It's truly lovely to look at.  But useful?  No don't think so.  Why?  Awkward.  Have to unzip to get to palm; zip back up to put palm away.  Alot of zip/unzipping if you ask me.  If you don't use your palm often it's nice  but if it's an essential part of your life then it's aggravating to have to  deal with this case.
